text:
Also I hastily made the decision to revert the last merge of main we made with the custom 404 page because I know Artur was unhappy with our process in doing that. I wanted to make sure we make our merges in a way that we can all be happy. However since I'm a complete noob, I'm not sure I even reverted the merge correctly because it made a separate branch called "revert 16 custom 404" so I probably just made the situation worse.

Sorry everybody. This is my first time with a group repo and it shows.

text:
Hi!

I appreciate it, I planned to steal few minutes of your time today guys to show what I know about pull requests and code reviews, I want to show what in my opinion is wrong and why
